idiom.meaning: Essentially the same with minor differences
idiom.example: Most smartphones today are largely similar with only minor differences.

shortDescription: This idiom has roots in the Confucian concept of 'datong' (大同), meaning 'great unity' or 'grand harmony,' which described an ideal society.
